content:
I created a user group for const generics: @project-const-generics. This could be useful if there are issues we want to bring to people's attention (like @lcnr did earlier). I added several people, but the autocomplete was a bit buggy, so if you weren't added, you'll need to add yourself manually.
cc @oli in particular â€“ it didn't seem to like your username.
Let me know if you're interested, but are unable to add yourself because you don't have the right permissions (I'm not sure what permissions are necessary), and I'll try to add you.
poor oli :joy:
nice, thanks :heart:
I added myself :grinning:
